summary.span: 基本设计器类，用于扩展根设计文档中支持嵌套组件的设计模式行为。

span.span: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of a root design document that supports nested components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持嵌套的组件的根设计文档的设计器提供基类。 provides a base class for designers of root design documents that support nested components. 除了方法和功能从继承类，实现接口，以提供根级别设计模式视图关联的组件，以及任何嵌套的组件。In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the class, implements the interface to provide a root-level design mode view for the associated component, and any nested components. > [!NOTE] > 根级别设计模式视图或通常由内置根设计器提供。The root-level design mode view for a or is typically provided by a built-in root designer. 自定义实现所需的其他类型的根组件在设计模式下提供的视图。A custom implementation is required to provide a view for other types of root components in design mode. 可以将设计器关联的类型使用。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅[扩展设计时支持](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2).

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

Protected Overridable Function GetToolSupported (tool As ToolboxItem) As Boolean
abstract member GetToolSupported : System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem -> bool override this.GetToolSupported : System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem -> bool

param.name: tool
param.span: 要对其进行工具箱支持测试的 。

span.span: The to test for toolbox support.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器是否支持指定工具。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified tool is supported by the designer.

returns.span: 如果应在工具箱上启用该工具，则为 ；如果文档设计器不知道如何使用该工具，则为 。

span.span: if the tool should be enabled on the toolbox; if the document designer doesn't know how to use the tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支持一种工具，则它将在设计器重新获得焦点时启用工具箱中。If a tool is supported, it will be enabled in the toolbox when the designer regains focus. 否则，它将被禁用。Otherwise, it will be disabled. 后一种工具被标记为启用或禁用它不能再次查询。Once a tool is marked as enabled or disabled it cannot be queried again.

span.span: Initializes the designer with the specified component.

span.para: 在设计器可以访问组件的站点，并在这种方法从其请求服务。
The designer can access the component's site and request services from it in this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这接口方法重写将添加一个非可浏览，设计时仅`boolean`名"TrayLargeIcon"到此设计器的组件为在设计时属性。This interface method override adds a non-browsable, design-time only `boolean` property named "TrayLargeIcon" to this designer's component at design time. 组件栏使用此属性。This property is used by the component tray.
